text: The Saskatoon Blazers is a Midget AAA ice hockey team from Saskatoon, Saskatchewan, Canada. They are a member of the Saskatchewan Midget AAA Hockey League. They played their home games at the Agri Twins, but have since switched to playing at the Harold Latrace Arena. ==Notable alumni== *Colby Armstrong *Jarret Stoll *Rhett Warrener ==External links== * http://www.saskatoonblazers.com/ Category:Ice hockey teams in Saskatchewan
title: Saskatoon Blazers
